pkgmetadata.longdescription: Function to find nonparametric BCa intervals // Function BCa finds confidence intervals using Efron's nonparametric bias- corrected and accelerated (BCa) bootstrap method. It is an enhanced derivative of the function bcanon, forked from bootstrap_2012.04-1. Adaptive determination of the number of bootstrap replications is supported and the amount of memory required is less by a factor of nboot.
